We're in BETA! 🚀
============

Unleash your creativity with Jot Ideas! Instantly capture, organize, and manage all your brilliant thoughts and ideas, directly from your browser. 💡

*Key Features:*

✏️ Add ideas directly: Open the extension and add a new idea instantly from any webpage.

📝 Capture text snippets: Easily add new ideas from existing text on any webpage. Simply highlight some text, and right-click to 'Add new idea to Jot Ideas'.

🔗 Add additional context: Enrich your ideas by attaching URLs and notes.

🗂️ Categorize and Organize: Optionally assign categories to your ideas for easy retrieval and organization.

🧐 Filter and Focus: View your ideas by category, helping you stay focused and organized.

📤 Export and Import: Conveniently back up and share your ideas with CSV export/import functionality.

🌟 Sleek and User-Friendly: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface that makes idea management a breeze.

Jot Ideas is the perfect companion for creatives, professionals, students, and anyone looking to capture and organize their thoughts on the fly. Install now and start transforming your ideas into action! 🚀

*Support and Feedback:*

Have questions or suggestions? Contact us at customersupport@sopheon.com - we'd love to hear from you! 👂


=================
*What's New in v1.1.1*
- Fixes bug where editing first idea meant one could not add another
- Styling updates

*What's New in v1.1.0*

- Fixes import/export bug where new lines in notes would create new ideas
- Styling improvements
